main event: A civilian ground-visual observation of a UFO occurred on 10 November 1957 in Norwich, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object appeared like a meteorite or ball of fire,The object moved at a high rate of speed out of sight over a mountain,The length of the observation was approximately 4 seconds,The sighting described one round object that started slow and was bright,The report suggests the characteristics of the sighting are typical of a meteorite.
sighted object: one round object resembling a meteorite
